name: Arrays
description:
Thanks to unforseen cut on available time this is just extremly short experience, I recommend using fullscreen. Whole thing takes only few minutes to solve.

Pause and Settings are mapped on key "P" on keyboard, becouse "ESC" return from fullscreen.

Controls:

  • [W][A][S][D] - Movement
  • Mouse - Look
  • Left Mouse Button - Interact
